question: I take Lunista right before bedtime to help me sleep at 9pm. I end up waking up for the  last month at least 5-6 tiimes during the night. I used to sleep well with the drug. I have been taking it for quite awhile. Not sure what to do. I do not snore alot (wifes tells me when I do), Not overweight, and no diabetes.
title: waking up on meds
